p: In Fig. 1, two arrows from SinMod point into the fish stock box in the CAb- ABe-module, representing the two datasets of monthly average ocean temperatures of each cell at 50-metre depth and the monthly biomass of small zooplankton species contained in each cell’s water column. In addition to these two datasets, SinMod also provides bathymetric data which by nature are fixed for the considered time period. The SinMod time series utilised in this study covers the 45-year period 2012–2057 aggregated to monthly intervals. SinMod data have in this study been converted from its original grid resolution of 20 km times 20 km to the CAb- ABe model resolution of 80 km times 80 km (see Eide 2014 for further details).
